io.spine.server.bus

Interface MessageDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends MessageEnvelope>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the type of class of the dispatched messages
    E - the type of the message envelopes
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandDispatcher, EventDispatcher, MulticastDispatcher<C,E>, UnicastDispatcher<C,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommandDispatcher, AbstractCommander, AbstractCommandHandler, AbstractEventReactor, AbstractEventSubscriber, AbstractStatefulReactor, AggregatePartRepository, AggregateRepository, CatchUpProcess, EventDispatchingRepository, ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository

    public interface MessageDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends MessageEnvelope>
    A dispatcher of a message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean canDispatch(E envelope)
      Checks if this dispatcher can dispatch the given message.
      void dispatch(E envelope)
      Dispatches the message contained in the passed envelope.
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<C> messageClasses()
      Obtains a set of message classes that can be processed by this dispatcher.

    • Method Detail

      • messageClasses

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<C> messageClasses()
        Obtains a set of message classes that can be processed by this dispatcher.
        Returns:
        non-empty set of message classes

      • dispatch

        void dispatch(E envelope)
        Dispatches the message contained in the passed envelope.
        Parameters:
        envelope - the envelope with the message

      • canDispatch

        default boolean canDispatch(E envelope)
        Checks if this dispatcher can dispatch the given message.

        This method does not check that the type of the message is one of the dispatched message classes. Instead, it validates the message upon some custom rules of this dispatcher.

        Extend this method to forbid messages from being dispatched to this instance.

        Parameters:
        envelope - the message to check
        Returns:
        true is the given message can be dispatched by this dispatcher, false otherwise
